name: Looping Meadows - Rebalanced
description:
This is a rebalancing of my Ludum Dare 47 entry, but since this is past the 48 hour jam period I don't want to replace any links on the LD site itself.  Plus this can be more for experimenting or whatever.

Original LD47 entry:  https://kirbloid.itch.io/ludum-dare-47-loopingmeadows
